property.name: Text
property.value: While Dain Ironfoot is ready, Dwarf characters get +1 Û and +1 Ò.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a hero.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attached hero gains sentinel.
Action: Pay 1 resource from attached hero's pool to attach Dunedain Signal to another hero.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play after shadow cards have been dealt, before any attacks have resolved.
Combat Action: Each player may choose and discard 1 facedown shadow card from an enemy with which he is engaged.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Eagle.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Eagles of the Misty Mountains cannot have restricted attachments. Eagles of the Misty Mountains gets +1 Û and +1 Ú for each facedown attachment it has.
Response: After another Eagle character leaves play, you may attach that card facedown to Eagles of the Misty Mountains.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Ï hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Support of the Eagles to choose an Eagle ally. Until the end of the phase, attached hero adds that ally's Û or Ú (choose 1) to its own.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play West Road Traveller from your hand, switch the active location with any other location in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, all Rohan characters get +2 Ò.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Silvan. Scout.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Mirkwood Runner is attacking alone, the defending enemy does not count its Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Look at the top card of the encounter deck. Then, you may pay 1 Î resource to return Rumour from the Earth to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Move the top card of the encounter discard pile to the top of the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Search the encounter deck for Gollum. Choose a player to guard Gollum at the start of the game, and place Gollum in front of that player. Then shuffle the encounter deck. Reveal 1 card per player from the encounter deck, and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value:
The player guarding Gollum cannot commit characters to this quest (unless he is the only player remaining in the game).
If the players quest unsuccessfully, Gollum escapes and the players have lost the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: The player guarding Gollum cannot play cards from his hand.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the beginning of the combat phase, all enemies in play engage the player guarding Gollum.
Players cannot defeat this stage if there are any enemies in play. If players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value:
Damage from undefended attacks against you must be dealt to Gollum. If Gollum is destroyed, or if the player guarding Gollum is eliminated, the players have lost the game.
Forced: At the end of each round, raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 3. Then, that player may choose a new player to guard Gollum.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Spider's Ring is the active location, the player guarding Gollum cannot change.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If this attack is undefended, return any current active location to the staging area. The Spider's Ring becomes the active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: While Dry Watercourse is the active location, all treachery card effects that target the player guarding Gollum also target each other player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value:
Travel: The player guarding Gollum must exhaust a hero he controls to travel to Woodman's Glade.
Response: After exploring Woodman's Glade, reduce the threat of each player not guarding Gollum by 2.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the players travel to Wood Elf Path, the player guarding Gollum may choose a new player to guard him.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 8. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Raise the threat of the player guarding Gollum by 4.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 4 damage to a hero controlled by the player guarding Gollum. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal 2 damage to a hero controlled by the player guarding Gollum.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard the top 10 cards from the deck of the player guarding Gollum. That player must choose a new player to guard Gollum, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard the top 5 cards from the deck of the player guarding Gollum.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Mirkwood Bats engages a player, deal 1 damage to each character controlled by the player guarding Gollum.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Spider.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Attercop, Attercop automatically engages the player guarding Gollum, regardless of his threat.
